price: 45. Aabbow! Anigu waxaan ka cabsan inuu kaa taabto cadaab xagga (Alle) Raxmaanka, markaas aad u noqoto shaydaanka rafiiq (naarta gudaheeda).
arabic: يَٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٞ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَٰنِ وَلِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāabati innī akhāfu an yamassaka ʿadhābun mina al-raḥmāni fatakūna lilshayṭāni waliyyan
